about_the_game:
In the dark ages of ancient times, greed, selfishness, and arrogance reached their peak due to humanity! In this way, the power of darkness can be inspired in the abyss and make foolish actions! The 108 demon stars in the demon world have finally been awakened! They will rule this era with darkness, terror, and death! Eliminate all life! The world is in danger! Whenever darkness descends, there is a golden spirit of war that represents light and justice. The spirit of golden war saves the world! Duel with the devil! Maintain world peace! Keep fighting! Sao Nian!

This game is a dual personality game. Both single and double players can play.

The artificial intelligence in the game is quite powerful! Are you sure you will win?

The game is currently under development!

Player 1 (wsad) up and down movement (jkluioneq) is an attack jump blocking skill

Player 2 (keyboard directional keys) moves up and down (0.123456789), which is an attack blocking skill.

Golden Soul "is a magnificent action fighting game with a golden style, where players engage in life and death duels, superpowers, boxing, and time control at lightning fast speeds, unleashing their potential in gorgeous, ruthless, crazy, and painful battles.

Unique and outstanding battles: Defeat opponents in various situations, experience passion in battles, fully unleash your potential, and unleash different skills with various combinations of keys.

Artificial Intelligence: Everyone is designed with various combat intelligence. The enemy has great power and wisdom. They were endowed with combat wisdom. You can use creativity and flexibility to solve enemies one by one.

Secret: There are many secrets and surprises waiting for you to explore in the game!
